name: Hotel Maya - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at the Hotel Maya for a weekend getaway using Hilton points. This is our new favorite hotel in the L.A. area!
reviews.title: Amazing renovated hotel right on the water!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The entire property has been completely renovated and the rooms and common areas are very modern and new. The room was larger than most hotel rooms and had a good sized balcony overlooking the marina, the Long Beach skyline, the Queen Mary, and out to the ocean! We had room service dinner on the balcony as the sun was setting - beautiful and romantic! The rooms are all new, with comfortable beds, a large HD TV with connections for your laptop, complete with two wine glasses for your enjoyment. The bathroom was completely redone, including a new tub. The bathroom is on the small side, but I'd trade that for the beautiful balcony any day!
reviews.title: Great Value, Stylish Hotel

description: Hotel Maya is the first distinctive full-service, luxury Long Beach boutique resort hotel, located on the scenic downtown waterfront. A fusion of Latin American beachside Long Beach resort with modern Southern California style, Hotel Maya embodies the romantic, eclectic, and vibrant lifestyle of Long Beach, California.
